review: Love the fire stick.  However, the app to turn my cell phone into a remote screwed up my cell phone.  Even after deleting the app, phone not correct.  It deleted some apps pre installed on the phone by LG.  Now I have to back up everything and reset to factory specs and hope that it not only restores the missing apps, but that I can get my contacts, pictures and other stuff back again.

review: Excellent product!  It found my WI-FI easily and connection was a snap.  Since it was already registered to my Amazon Prime account, my movie/ TV show list was immediately available.  Adding apps like Netflix, Showtime and others were without issue as my Internet and TV service is currently UVerse.  So far this device has provided me with several hours of viewing in any location that I choose.
author: Amazon Customer
